tvdb: Ian walks in on Kevin kissing Eve and Kevin refrains from telling her about Ian and Lucy's affair.  Ian tries confessing to Eve, but instead asks if they can start over.  Lucy sees Caleb with Livvie in the woods, but Caleb disappears and Livvie denies he was there.  Lucy tells Kevin Caleb's back, but Kevin, still reeling over her affair, sends her home as Livvie steals a photo of Ian and Lucy together.  Rafe hints to Jack that Caleb's back and they go to the catacombs, find Caleb's music box and Jack collapses after opening it.  Caleb summons a dark force and his late man-servant James appears with his music box.
